title: can you still get pax twisted fate
body: can you get the skin by the random chest skin or not. I know you had to be at pax in 2009 my buddy got him he had money why i didn't is thier still a way to get him

replies.body: This thread got necroed. I'm locking it as there's nothing else to discuss here.

Hey Bossdragon214,

As others have mentioned, there is currently no way to obtain this skin. Last year, we disabled all older skin codes, due to people selling them, and scamming people into buying a skin code that didn't work. Going forward, skins that are given out at events expire shortly after the event to prevent this issue from occurring in the future.

Is there any way that you could make it available again soon ? I'd love to buy it (Making it for the same as Pulsefire Ezreal or Spirit Guard Udyr, or a bit higher, I would love to pick that skin the blue/black is dank) Sorry about using an old thread btw
It's a conversation that we've had internally, but at this time, have decided against bringing it back.
Will Pax Tf still be handed out at future Pax conventions?
We don't have plans to do so, no.
What about Silver Kayle? I remember i saw her twice in 2010 or 2011 and never seen again. But really loved it!

Nope -  Collector's Edition skins could only be achieved through digital or retail Collector's Edition packs. Silver Kayle falls into this category, making it a limited skin, as opposed to legacy. (Black Alistar and Human Ryze are also in this bucket - they were only available with pre-orders of the game way back when).
Aww alright, but will Underworld TF be brought back anytime soon ? I own literally every Tf skin but Underworld and Pax and wanna complete the collection lol.
He usually makes a return around Halloween, as he's one of the Harrowing legacy skins. :) It's also possible to see him when the legacy vault opens (it's random - no set date each year on this one).
Great, I'll be waiting :D p.s. I'm the same rank as you so we could potentially duo if you're up for it (I sent you a friend request)
Its literally just a blue recolor of TF. No one with a brain would pay 3500 RP for that.
It's not for the skin man, it's for sentimental reasons, a collection. And the cape and shoulder pads also change (Besides blue looks super cool on him)
To be honest, the skin itself is rather plain-looking. People only want it because it is rare.

i'm a collector and its not far to stop pax tf and not make it even for sale with high price i can buy it with any price but i know that there is some scams so what do i have to do now ? i want it so bad and i have all the skins now
So Riot i saw that you said you will bring him  back. Can you tell us more about it ? Thanks.

*lounges around with my pax/riot skins with a smug grin*

:^)

Ya sadly you cannot get him anymore. They have disabled all codes and from future skin codes they are only available for about 2-3 weeks after the event! I mean it's kinda good they finally did that because people were using programs to get these codes hence why it seems like they had an endless supply! It's just also they were selling them at a high price as well, which doesn't make sense why riot would care. If they cared that much they should have just released it to everyone, or have all codes available through pax all year round instead of having one skin per year! But I believe also the means of how they give out the codes is a bit "scam"ish. I'm not sure how it is but I guess riot was trying to help gamers not lose or have their account taken away!
i think they disabled all the codes for the older ones because you used to be able to get it from websites
Kind of sucks though, friend is a big TF main, has every skin but Pax, I wanted to get it for him for his birthday but can't anymore :(
